tasks.title: Project Setup
tasks.description: Set up the Python environment, requirements.txt, and project directory structure as defined in systemPatterns.md. Initialize git if not already done.
tasks.details:
- Create requirements.txt with: fastapi, uvicorn, pandas, sqlalchemy, jinja2, faker, aiosqlite, pytest, httpx, htmx.
- Create directory structure: ingest/, engine/, web/, guardrails/, operator/, docs/.
- Create .gitignore.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify environment activation and package installation.

tasks.title: Implement Data Generator
tasks.description: Implement the synthetic data generator to create realistic Plaid-like transaction data for 50-100 users.
tasks.details:
- Create `ingest/generator.py`.
- Use `Faker` to generate users.
- Ensure generation of specific persona patterns, especially 'Wealth Compounder' (High Income + Low Savings).
- Output JSON/CSV files.
tasks.testStrategy: Run generator and verify output contains expected patterns and volume.

tasks.title: Implement Data Loader
tasks.description: Implement the data loader to ingest generated data into SQLite.
tasks.details:
- Create `ingest/loader.py`.
- Define SQLAlchemy models in `ingest/models.py` (or similar): Users, Accounts, Transactions.
- Ingest CSV/JSON into `spendsense.db`.
tasks.testStrategy: Query SQLite db to verify data integrity.

tasks.title: Implement Feature Engine
tasks.description: Implement the feature engineering module to calculate behavioral metrics.
tasks.details:
- Create `engine/features.py`.
- Calculate: Burn Rate, Liquid Runway, Inefficiency Score, Credit Utilization, Subscription metrics.
- Use Pandas/SQL aggregations.
- Populate `financial_snapshot` table.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for metric calculations against known inputs.

tasks.title: Implement Persona Classifier
tasks.description: Implement the decision tree for assigning user personas.
tasks.details:
- Create `engine/classifier.py`.
- Implement logic for: Debt Fighter, Gig Worker, Auto-Payer, Wealth Compounder, Optimizer.
- Update `users` table with assigned persona.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify correct classification of seed users with known patterns.

tasks.title: Implement Recommendation Engine
tasks.description: Create the logic to generate specific, math-backed recommendations.
tasks.details:
- Create `engine/recommendations.py`.
- Implement logic to generate headlines and 'Because' strings based on user persona and metrics.
- Populate `recommendations` table.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify recommendations match persona needs and reference correct data.

tasks.title: Build API Endpoints
tasks.description: Create FastAPI endpoints to serve user data and recommendations.
tasks.testStrategy: Test endpoints with curl or Swagger UI.

tasks.title: Build User Interface
tasks.description: Develop the 'Stunning' UI using Jinja2, Tailwind, and htmx.
tasks.details:
- Setup templates directory and base layout.
- Implement Dashboard view with Hero section and Insight Feed.
- Integrate Chart.js for visualizations.
- Use htmx for interactivity.
tasks.testStrategy: Visual inspection of UI responsiveness and design fidelity.

tasks.title: Implement Operator View
tasks.description: Build the Streamlit admin dashboard for oversight.
tasks.details:
- Create `operator/app.py`.
- Connect to `spendsense.db`.
- Implement user table view and override functionality.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify operator can view data and override personas.
